content: the whimsy head wrap is the perfect accessory for a pretty and practical addition to your wardrobe this pattern is a quick and easy can be adjusted for size and also makes a great gift this pattern is featured in the may 2020 issue of happily hooked magazine this pattern as all of my patterns has been thoroughly tested by testers of different skill level due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns for sales giveaways and info on new pattern releases sign up for email newsletter at www throughtheloopyc com find more ttlyc on youtube https //www youtube com/c/throughtheloopyarncraft you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make
